body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Edward Thomas, how can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Edward! My name is Sharon Bell. I'm interested in learning more about the cars you have available.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Sharon! To better assist you, could you let me know your preferred car type?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for a compact SUV.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect choice! Could I please have your contact number so I can send you some available options?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's six one seven, five five five, zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon. Also, could you provide your email address so we can keep in touch?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's sharon.bell at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. We'll make sure to send you the details of the SUVs we have in stock.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you so much, Edward. I look forward to hearing from you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sharon! Thank you for your time. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Edward Thomas and the customer's name is Sharon Bell.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
